results.deck: A karaoke game made to play with a group of friends.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution Party

results.deck: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows continues the traditions of the long running multiplayer hack and slash, franchise Gauntlet.
results.name: Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows

results.deck: A virtual humanoid robot who responds to voice commands, never released outside of Japan.
results.name: N.U.D.E. Natural Ultimate Digital Experiment

results.deck: The fourth installment to the Burnout series, Revenge expands on the fast-paced racing series by adding new features such as same-way Traffic Checking, Vertical Takedowns, Traffic Attack mode, and changes to Crash mode.
results.name: Burnout Revenge

results.deck: This strategic action game follows a four-man squad of SAS or Delta Force troops on missions through Iraq during the Gulf war.
results.name: Conflict: Desert Storm II: Back to Baghdad

results.deck: Agent Under Fire is a game released by EA under the James Bond license. It was the first James Bond game released for the then new generation of consoles.
results.name: 007: Agent Under Fire

results.deck: Madden NFL 07 was the first version of Madden to appear on the Wii and the PS3.  It also added lead blocking controls along with numerous other new features.
results.name: Madden NFL 07

results.deck: Freaky Flyers is a mascot-style racing game that puts characters into tiny, cartoonish planes with power-ups that can help turn the tide of a race.
results.name: Freaky Flyers

results.deck: Players compete in a multitude of games from water craft races to hot potato with a bomb, all the while collecting points to use in the winner-takes-all final round!
results.name: Fuzion Frenzy

results.deck: Robotech: Battlecry is an action game based on the Robotech universe.
results.name: Robotech: Battlecry

results.deck: Big Red One is the second game in the Call of Duty series developed by Treyarch, and is not similar to Call of Duty 2.
results.name: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One

results.deck: Medal of Honor Rising Sun moves away from Europe and into Asia where the enemy changes from the Nazis to the Japanese.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun

results.deck: Yager is a flight simulation game set in the future. The player flies a ship that has both flight and hover modes.
results.name: Yager

results.deck: Finding Nemo is a game based on the film of the same name.
results.name: Disney/Pixar's Finding Nemo

results.deck: Street Fighter Anniversary Collection combines SFIII: 3rd Strike and Hyper Street Fighter II: Anniversary Edition onto one disc.
results.name: Street Fighter: Anniversary Collection

results.deck: Tao Feng: Fist of the Lotus is an Xbox-exclusive fighting game designed by Mortal Kombat co-creator John Tobias after departing Midway to form Studio Gigante.
results.name: Tao Feng: Fist of the Lotus

results.deck: A first-person shooter/third-person action game hybrid that puts players in the role of a young Padawan student (called Jaden) at Luke Skywalker's Jedi Academy.
results.name: Star Wars: Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy

results.deck: ESPN NBA Basketball (also known as NBA 2K4) is the fifth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2003/2004 NBA season while adding a new player manuever system (using the right analog stick) and a new player creation/training mode.
results.name: ESPN NBA Basketball 2004

results.deck: Kate Walker, a successful lawyer, travels to find Hans, the sole heir to a factory and eventually ends up on a journey to find him and the once thought to be extinct Mammoths.
results.name: Syberia

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is the second 3D game in the series and sixth original title. It features more of the same sand-box action-adventure gameplay with a new 1980s setting, new characters, new weapons and much more.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

results.deck: Azurik: Rise of Perathia is an action-adventure game developed by Adrenium Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios in 2001
results.name: Azurik: Rise of Perathia

results.deck: The seventh game in the Leisure Suit Larry series takes the franchise to college.
results.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude

results.deck: The third game of the SSX franchise, SSX3 continues the tradition of over-the-top Uber Tricks, super stylistic characters and introduces the "One Mountain" concept.
results.name: SSX 3

results.deck: Evil Dead: Regeneration puts Ash into a non-canon world in which he never went back in time after Evil Dead II.  He also gets a half deadite sidekick.
results.name: Evil Dead: Regeneration

results.deck: A low budget street racing game with a focus on customisation.
results.name: Top Gear RPM Tuning

results.deck: TimeSplitters 2 is a frantic rush through time to rescue the Time Crystals from the evil TimeSplitters, who would like nothing more than to end mankind's existence.
results.name: TimeSplitters 2

results.deck: Batter Up! It's time for EA Sports' 2002 entry into their baseball franchise Triple Play.
results.name: Triple Play 2002

results.deck: Sega Soccer Slam is a no-holds-barred Soccer game that is available for the Xbox, PS2, and GameCube.  It was also released as an Xbox Original for the Xbox 360 on December 15, 2008.
results.name: Sega Soccer Slam

results.deck: Aquaman: Battle for Atlantis is a third-person action game starring DC Comics' titular superhero. It is often critically panned due to multiple factors.
results.name: Aquaman: Battle for Atlantis

results.deck: You are John Dalton, an ex-Marine assigned to patrol the edge of human space as a Marshal for the Terran Colonial Authority. Unexpectedly, your monotonous life is shattered by a chilling distress signal, plunging you into an adventure beyond belief. Violent turmoil among the races has erupted on your watch.
results.name: Unreal II: The Awakening

results.deck: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is the the second game in the Sands of Time series. Adopting a much darker tone, Warrior Within follows the Prince to the Island of Time as he attempts to change the past in order to end the Dahaka's relentless pursuit.
results.name: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

results.deck: The third entry in Bethesda's series of expansive first-person role-playing games. Arriving on the island of Vvardenfell as a prisoner, the player character is caught up in an ancient prophecy, as well as a power struggle between factions, races, and gods incarnate.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind

results.deck: The best football management sim game in the world, no arguments.
results.name: Championship Manager: Season 01/02

results.deck: Purple Haze takes you into the violence and danger that was Vietnam. Choose from six new weapons, attach bayonets to your rifle, and be on the lookout for attacks from fighter jets & B-52 bombers.
results.name: Vietcong: Purple Haze

results.deck: MechAssault is a third-person mech combat game with lots of robots and lots of destruction.
results.name: MechAssault

results.deck: The Flash game from Newgrounds hits home consoles in Alien Hominid, a sidescrolling run-and-gun game marking The Behemoth's first foray into console gaming.
results.name: Alien Hominid

results.deck: Construct and furnish a home, and then influence the day-to-day lives of its occupants (called Sims) in an isometrical "people simulator" by Will Wright.
results.name: The Sims

results.deck: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Black Arrow is the successful expansion to Rainbow Six 3. Multiplayer updates like "Retrieval" mode and split screen co-operative play help distinguish Black Arrow from its predecessors.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Black Arrow

results.deck: An open-world game spoofing 1950s sci-fi films. The player is an alien named Crypto who comes to Earth with the express purpose of wiping out the human race.
results.name: Destroy All Humans!

results.deck: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny is the only Xbox entry in the Yu-Gi-Oh franchise.
results.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny

results.deck: A racing game with cars from the Ford company.
results.name: Ford Mustang: The Legend Lives

results.deck: Forza Motorsport is a road racing sim developed by Turn 10 Studios. The game is known for its in-depth car customizing and for including features that rival racing sims, like Gran Turismo, would not like car damage.
results.name: Forza Motorsport

results.deck: Driver parallel lines is the fourth game in the Driver video game series. The game features mostly vehicle-based gameplay, with a moderate amount of on-foot sections.
results.name: Driver: Parallel Lines

results.deck: Rogue Ops is a multi platform, third-person stealth game.
results.name: Rogue Ops

results.deck: A game based on the cartoon, Codename: Kids Next Door.
results.name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.

results.deck: An action/adventure game based on the Lord of the Rings franchise released to coincide with the final film in the movie trilogy.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

results.deck: A collection of 29 of Taito's classic (and not-so-classic) games from the past including Space Invaders.
results.name: Taito Legends

results.deck: Smashing up things in New York City.
results.name: Smashing Drive

results.deck: Players control Bruce Lee, the martial arts master called to investigate a mysterious underground organization called the Black Lotus.
results.name: Bruce Lee: Quest of the Dragon

results.deck: When the military takes over a ski resort, you take to the slopes and try to uncover the mystery in this story-based snowboarding game.
results.name: Dark Summit

results.deck: A game about those little cars that ride on grooves. How neat!
results.name: GrooveRider:  Slot Car Thunder

results.deck: A new villain begins his reign on Gotham City, and it's up to Batman and his allies to stop him in this brawler based on The New Adventures of Batman and Robin animated TV series.
results.name: Batman: Rise of Sin Tzu

results.deck: Sniper Elite is a third person action game set against the backdrop of a nearly completed destroyed 1945 Berlin. As a disguised agent, your sniper rifle is your weapon of choice.
results.name: Sniper Elite

results.deck: Play as a Simpsons character and drive around Springfield as you taxi around other famous Springfield residents.
results.name: The Simpsons: Road Rage

results.deck: Continuing the massive destruction, intense combat, and addicting online modes, MechAssault 2 adds new layers of Mechs, vehicles, and gameplay dynamics to those from the first.
results.name: MechAssault 2: LoneWolf

results.deck: Don't you just wish you could do this to your neighbor.
results.name: Neighbors from Hell

results.deck: The first of two expansions of The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind
results.name: The Elder Scrolls III: Tribunal

results.deck: A Sci-Fi FPS game.
results.name: Headhunter: Redemption

results.deck: Although not actually based on a true story, as the misleading packaging claims, Fatal Frame is still a beloved horror game in which a camera is the player's only weapon against malevolent spirits.
results.name: Fatal Frame

results.deck: Just Cause is an open-world action game that has you play as Rico Rodriguez, a black-ops agent helping guerrillas to overthrow the government of San Esperito.
results.name: Just Cause

results.deck: The King of Fighters 2003 turned out to be the last game in the series released on the Neo-Geo console. Ports with 3D backgrounds were made for other systems. Tag-team gameplay was added and the game introduced lot of new characters.
results.name: The King of Fighters 2003

results.deck: Pirates: The Legend of Black Kat is a game set in the pirate era where you play as the protagonist, Kat, a feisty and agile female pirate.
results.name: Pirates: The Legend of Black Kat

results.deck: Backyard Wrestling 2: There Goes the Neighborhood is an arcade style fighting game loosely based on no holds barred wrestling.
results.name: Backyard Wrestling 2: There Goes the Neighborhood

results.deck: The 2002 entry in Midway's ludicrous baseball series.
results.name: MLB SlugFest 20-03

results.deck: The second installment of Xbox exclusive DDR games.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution ULTRAMIX 2
Outlaw Golf: 9 More Holes of X-Mas

results.deck: A WW2 fighter plane game.
results.name: Heroes of the Pacific

results.deck: Battle pigs using time and garbage as your main weapons.
results.name: Blinx the Time Sweeper

results.deck: Dead to Rights II is the return of action-hero Jack Slate and his K-9 companion, Shadow, where they find themselves once again in the squalid, mean streets of Grant City, ensnared in a labyrinth of crime, corruption and betrayal.
results.name: Dead to Rights II

results.deck: In this abysmally received first-person shooter, a lone farmer must fight the undead all the way from his homestead to the rumored last bastion of the living - Fiddler's Green.
results.name: Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green

results.deck: Return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and wizardry in Harry Potter's fourth year, this time based directly on the film
results.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

results.deck: NASCAR Thunder 2004 features Tony Stewart on the cover and all new grudges and alliances. It is still considered by most as the best Nascar game made by EA SPORTS.
results.name: NASCAR Thunder 2004

results.deck: This is a game based on the sport of MMA.
results.name: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Tapout

results.deck: NHL 2002 showed the additions of Don Taylor's unique commentary and the NHL Cards mode, which allowed a player to collect cards that would affect give players skill boosts when used in game.
results.name: NHL 2002

results.deck: The 2005 installment of the FIFA series.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2005

results.deck: Magic The Gathering: Battlegrounds is a realtime combat game in which you battle advisories by summoning different creatures and spells.
results.name: Magic: The Gathering - Battlegrounds

results.deck: Midway Arcade Treasures is a compilation of the company's biggest games from the 80s.
results.name: Midway Arcade Treasures

results.deck: Jack Skellington is back ... and he's armed to the bone!  Control Tim Burton's Jack Skellington to battle Oogie Boogie for control of Halloween Town.
results.name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas: Oogie's Revenge

results.deck: As private investigator Jack Walters, you must investigate mysterious disappearances in the town of Innsmouth. This investigation takes you deep into the dark and unsettling world of H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu mythos.
results.name: Call of Cthulhu: Dark Corners of the Earth

results.deck: Fantasy shooter where players clear maze-like dungeons of monsters
results.name: Wizard of Wor

results.deck: Star Wars: KOTOR is a role-playing game set 4000 years before "A New Hope," featuring a Republic soldier who fights to stop Darth Malak and the Sith fleet from destroying the Republic. The game sports such innovations as turn-based combat that appears to run in real time and light or dark side alignment.
results.name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic

results.deck: Exile is the third game in the Myst series in which you play the Stranger, a friend of Atrus. In Exile, you must once again clean up a monumental mess created by Atrus' unruly sons.
results.name: Myst III: Exile

results.deck: SSX Tricky is the second game in the SSX franchise and was released under the now-defunct EA Sports Big label. Tricky is the first game in the series to feature Uber Tricks.
results.name: SSX Tricky

results.deck: The Hustle: Detroit Streets is a billiards game for the Xbox, PSP, and Playstation 2.
results.name: The Hustle: Detroit Streets

results.deck: Unreal Tournament 2003 is a fast-paced multiplayer-based first-person shooter and the second game in the Unreal Tournament franchise, bringing the arena combat into a brand new game engine.
results.name: Unreal Tournament 2003

results.deck: A hack and slash game based on the 2005 movie of the same name.
results.name: King Arthur

results.deck: Malice, a goddess with help from The Metal Guardian, must stop the Dog God from destroying her world and the Universe. Armed with a giant club, she must find eight logic keys to track the Dog God down.
results.name: Malice
